org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state

类 RocksDBMapState<K,N,UK,UV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,MapState<UK,UV>,MapStateDescriptor<UK,UV>,java.util.Map<UK,UV>>
      • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.RocksDBMapState<K,N,UK,UV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    UK - The type of the keys in the map state.
    UV - The type of the values in the map state.
    所有已实现的接口:
    MapState<UK,UV>, State, InternalKvState<N>, InternalMapState<N,UK,UV>

    public class RocksDBMapState<K,N,UK,UV>
extends AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,MapState<UK,UV>,MapStateDescriptor<UK,UV>,java.util.Map<UK,UV>>
implements InternalMapState<N,UK,UV>
    MapState implementation that stores state in RocksDB.

    RocksDBStateBackend must ensure that we set the StringAppendOperator on the column family that we use for our state since we use the merge() call.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  RocksDBMapState.RocksDBMapEntry
      A map entry in RocksDBMapState.
      private class  RocksDBMapState.RocksDBMapIterator<T>
      An auxiliary utility to scan all entries under the given key.

    • 字段详细资料

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • userKeySerializer

        private final TypeSerializer<UK> userKeySerializer
        Serializer for the keys and values.

      • userValueSerializer

        private final TypeSerializer<UV> userValueSerializer

      • writeOptions

        private final org.rocksdb.WriteOptions writeOptions
        We disable writes to the write-ahead-log here. We can't have these in the base class because JNI segfaults for some reason if they are.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RocksDBMapState

        public RocksDBMapState(org.rocksdb.ColumnFamilyHandle columnFamily,

        Creates a new RocksDBMapState.
        参数:
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the namespace.
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state.

      • getSerializedValue

        public byte[] getSerializedValue(byte[] serializedKeyAndNamespace)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: InternalKvState
        Returns the serialized value for the given key and namespace.

        If no value is associated with key and namespace, null is returned.

        指定者:
        getSerializedValue 在接口中 InternalKvState<N>
        覆盖:
        getSerializedValue 在类中 AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,MapState<UK,UV>,MapStateDescriptor<UK,UV>,java.util.Map<UK,UV>>
        参数:
        serializedKeyAndNamespace - Serialized key and namespace
        返回:
        Serialized value or null if no value is associated with the key and namespace.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions during serialization are forwarded
